service.name: changeQuotationStatus
service.description: Change the status of an existing quotation

service.name: storeDeliveryRequirement
service.description: Creates delivery requirement entities: Requirement, OrderRequirementDelivery

service.name: loadCartFromOrderItem
service.description: Create a ShoppingCart Object based on an existing order

service.name: checkOrderItemAssocStatus
service.description: Check the status of all items associate and approved/complete orderItemAssoc if we can

service.name: createSalesStatement
service.description: Creates a Sales Statement for the userLogin. Requires SALESMGR_INOUT_CREATE permission.

service.name: findOrdersPre
service.description: Uses dynamic view entity to find orders; returns a list of Order (OrderHeader) objects

service.name: updateSalesStatement
service.description: Updates a Sales Statement for the userLogin. Requires SALESMGR_INOUT_UPDATE permission.

service.name: getSalesCommissionAmountList
service.description: View, calulate sales policy report by selecting duration time.

service.name: changeSalesStatementStatus
service.description: Change the status of an existing quotation

service.name: createSalesForecastAdvance
service.description: Creates a Sales Forecast for the userLogin. Requires ORDERMGR_4C_CREATE permission. This will save the forecast into the history as well. Note that this service does not compute the forecast. That must be done in a higher level service.

service.name: calculateProductPriceCustom
service.description: Calculate a Product's Price from ProductPriceRules

service.name: updateOrderItemsSales
service.description: Update the quantities/prices for an existing order

service.name: appendOrderItemSales
service.description: Append an item to an existing order

service.name: JQGetListOrderItem
service.description: Get list orderItem by Order type List of Map

service.name: JQGetListProductByCatalogAndStore
service.description: Get list product by Category Catalog type List of Map

service.name: JQGetListProductSalesOnlyProduct
service.description: Get list product selling only product table

service.name: getListQuantityUomByProduct
service.description: Get list product selling only product table

service.name: JQGetListRequirementAndItemDetail
service.description: Get list requirement and item detail

service.name: createReturnOrderFromRequirement
service.description: Create a return order by requirement

service.name: createReturnItemLoose
service.description: Create a new ReturnItem don't need (orderHeader and orderItem) in the RETURN_REQUESTED status, based on returnableQuantity and returnablePrice from the getReturnableQuantity service. This can be called by the customer to request a return for himself or by a user with ORDERMGR_CREATE, but, if the former, the returnPrice will be overriden by the returnablePrice from getReturnableQuantity.

service.name: JQGetListReturnOrderToCompany
service.description: Get list return order to company

service.name: sendNotifyChangeOrderStatus
service.description: Send a notify when order has changed status
